item.title: An example conference paper
item.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis posuere tellus ac convallis placerat. Proin tincidunt magna sed ex sollicitudin condimentum.

Tamora James is a PhD researcher with a former life as a web and software developer. Her research aims to identify effective conservation measures for parrots, using a demographic and life history based approach. Tamora is also interested in helping other researchers to improve their research software outputs by teaching them about tools and practices which are commonly used in software development. She has led a version control session as part of a workshop at the British Ecological Society Annual Meeting and she contributed the chapter on version control in the BES publication ‘A Guide to Reproducible Code in Ecology and Evolution’.
